Mike Key

Musing on Business, Self Improvement, Life and Travel
WHO

Father. Polymath. Autodidact. I read old books, lift heavy things, eat paleo and drink whiskey. Shipping code as a Front End Developer. I traveled with my family full time in our Airstream for a year and half. Now investing in real estate in Idaho will exploring on the weekends.
